DOC.brief_summary: Currently , spinal cord injury ( SCI ) demonstrate increase prevalence obesity ( 75 % ) cardiovascular disease ( 30 - 50 % ) , type II diabetes ( 21 % ) osteoporosis leg ( 100 % ) compare general population . It important identify mode intensity exercise likely generate reduction inactivity-related disease population . Therefore , main purpose pilot research project implement test form spinal cord injury-specific exercise , know FES rowing ( FES : functional electrical stimulation ) .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Electrical Stimulation With Rowing Exercise After Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.criteria: Have spinal cord injury , C5T12 ( level ) , AIS AD ( severity ) Be age 1875 duration study Medically stable healthy enough complete exercise requirement Willing able complete athome training requirement prescribe Willing able complete exercise session prescribe Willing able complete VO2 test throughout study Willing able complete DEXA ( Dualenergy Xray absorptiometry ) scan study Able understand follow write verbal instruction study staff Current pressure ulcer ( ) sit electrical stimulation Previous spontaneous lowimpact leg fracture Previous diagnosis cardiovascular disease ( ie enlarge heart , heart murmur ) Unsatisfactory result EKG ( electrocardiogram ) screen test Known thyroid dysfunction Kidney disease Cancer Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg Currently take blood pressure medication History epilepsy Current hand , arm shoulder injury Current deep vein thrombosis Implanted electronic cardiac device ( pace maker , defibrillator , etc ) Ventilatordependent Unable follow write verbal instruction
